trans-unit.source: Represents the enveloped signature transform for an XML digital signature as defined by the W3C.
trans-unit.target: 表示 W3C 所定義的 XML 數位簽章包裹簽章轉換。

trans-unit.source: The XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform class removes the <`Signatur`e> element from an XML document before the digest is computed.
trans-unit.target: XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform 類別移除`Signatur`e > 中的 XML 文件，然後再計算摘要項目。

trans-unit.source: With this transform, you can sign and verify all elements of an XML document except the XML digital signature elements.
trans-unit.target: 與這項轉換，您可以登入，並驗證 XML 文件的 XML 數位簽章項目以外的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: Although you can create and insert a signature into an XML document, verifying the modified document using the embedded signature will fail because the document now has additional elements.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您可以建立並插入至 XML 文件的簽章，但是驗證修改過的文件使用內嵌的簽章會失敗，因為文件現在會有額外的項目。

trans-unit.source: This transform removes the <`Signatur`e> element and allows you to verify the document using its original form.
trans-unit.target: 這項轉換會移除`Signatur`e > 項目，可讓您驗證使用其原始格式的文件。

trans-unit.source: Use the XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform class whenever you create an enveloped signature.
trans-unit.target: 每當您建立包裹的簽章時，請使用 XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform 類別。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the enveloped signature transform, see Section 6.6.4 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關轉換的詳細資訊，請參閱 6.6.4 XMLDSIG 規格中，可從在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ W3C。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> class with comments, if specified.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref>註解，如果指定類別。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include comments; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示包括註解。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns an XML representation of the parameters of an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object that are suitable to be included as subelements of an XMLDSIG <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回參數的 XML 表示法<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref>都適合用來為 XMLDSIG 的子元素所包含的物件<xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: A list of the XML nodes that represent the transform-specific content needed to describe the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object in an XMLDSIG <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 代表特定轉換的內容說明目前所需的 XML 節點的清單<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref>中 XMLDSIG 物件<xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns the output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前的輸出<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The type of the returned object must be <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回物件的類型必須是<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>

trans-unit.source: The output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 目前的輸出<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The containing XML document is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 包含 XML 文件是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object of type <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前的輸出<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref>型別的物件<xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The type of the returned object must be <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回物件的類型必須是<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>

trans-unit.source: The type of the output to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回之輸出的類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref> is the only valid type for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref>是為此參數唯一有效的類型。

trans-unit.source: The output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object of type <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 目前的輸出<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref>型別的物件<xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The type parameter is not an object.
trans-unit.target: type 參數不是物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of types that are valid inputs to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform.LoadInput*> method of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得屬於有效的輸入之型別的陣列<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform.LoadInput*>方法目前<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref>物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform.LoadInput*>

trans-unit.source: The valid input types to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform> are <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, and <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.
trans-unit.target: 有效的輸入類型，以<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform>是<xref:System.IO.Stream>， <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>，和<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform>

trans-unit.source: An array of valid input types for the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object; you can pass only objects of one of these types to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform.LoadInput*> method of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 在目前有效的輸入類型的陣列<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref>物件; 您可以將只有其中一個這些類型的物件傳遞<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform.LoadInput*>方法目前<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref>物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform.LoadInput*>

trans-unit.source: Parses the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref> as transform-specific content of a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref> element and configures the internal state of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object to match the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 剖析指定<xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref>做為轉換特定內容的<xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref>項目，並設定目前的內部狀態<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref>物件以符合<xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: Because no transform-specific content is defined for <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform>, a call to this method does not change the state of the transform.
trans-unit.target: 因為沒有特定轉換的內容為定義<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform>，呼叫這個方法不會變更轉換的狀態。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref> to load into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"> </xref>載入到目前<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Loads the specified input into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 將目前載入指定的輸入<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The type of the input object must be one of the types in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform.InputTypes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 輸入物件的類型必須是其中一個類型中<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform.InputTypes%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform.InputTypes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The input to load into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 要載入到目前之輸入<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The obj parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The obj parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The containing XML document is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 包含 XML 文件是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of types that are possible outputs from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform.GetOutput*> methods of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得屬於從可能的輸出之型別的陣列<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform.GetOutput*>方法目前<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref>物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform.GetOutput*>

trans-unit.source: The valid output types for <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform> are <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> and <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 有效的輸出型別<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform>和<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList><xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform>

trans-unit.source: An array of valid output types for the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object; only objects of one of these types are returned from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform.GetOutput*> methods of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 在目前有效的輸出型別的陣列<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref>物件，只有物件的下列其中一種會從傳回型別<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform.GetOutput*>方法在目前的<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref>物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform.GetOutput*>
